author: GameSpot
description:
This week Kurt and Lucy gotchu covered on what games are missing from The Game Award nominees, Call of Duty's BLOPS 7 sales struggle and and potential use of AI, celebrating the 20th anniversary of the Xbox 360, pouring one out for Rebecca Heineman, and competing in a game of Mario Kart 64 on the new Analogue 3D.

Email your letters to gotchacovered@gamespot.com

Check out the audio version:
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/4S5mfmLES0ubhj5xcDZJni
RSS Feed: https://www.spreaker.com/show/6752166/episodes/feed

Timestamps: 
00:00 - Intro
00:51 - What We Would Add to the Game Award Nominees
17:37 - Whats the Deal of Call of Duty BLOP 7?
21:14 - Black Ops 8 Mad Libs
27:27 - Favorite Memories of the Xbox 360
34:55 - Celebrating the Life of Rebecca Heineman
37:22 - Let's Play Mario Kart 64 on the Analogue 3D
title: The Game Award Nominees Revealed + Call of Duty BLOPS 7 Troubles | Kurt & Lucy Gotcha Covered
